mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.content as content, a.score as score, a.user_id as userId, u.nickname as userNickName, u.avatar as userAvatarUrl, a.order_id as orderId, a.product_id as productId, a.product_attr_id as productAttrId, sp.store_name as productName, sp.store_name as productAttrName from kx_store_appraise a, kx_user u, kx_store_product sp where a.user_id = u.uid and a.product_id = sp.id and a.product_id = #{productId} order by a.id desc limit #{offset},#{size}
